Sepeda Motor Tabrak Colt Diesel Box, Seorang Siswa SMP di Bukittinggi Meninggal
04 Nov 2019, 21:41 by Yudi Prama Agustino



Sepeda Motor Tabrak Colt Diesel Box, Seorang Siswa SMP di Bukittinggi Meninggal



Sepeda Motor Tabrak Colt Diesel Box, Seorang Siswa SMP di Bukittinggi Meninggal


KBRN, Bukittinggi : Satu orang pengendara sepeda motor yang diketahui murid salah seorang pelajar SMP Negeri di Bukittinggi meninggal dunia, setelah kendaraan roda dua yang dikendarainya menabrak mobil Colt Diesel Box, di Jalan Raya Panorama depan objek wisata Lobang Jepang, Senin 4 November 2019, sekira pukul 15.30 WIB sore tadi.
Kepala Unit Lakalantas Polres Bukittinggi, Ipda Novandri, menuturkan, mobil Colt Diesel Box yang dikemudikan Idris Mintaufik dengan nomor polisi BA 8013 BU, datang dari arah simpang DPRD Kota Bukittinggi menuju arah simpang Atas Ngarai, sampai di Tempat Kejadian Perkara (TKP), bertabrakan dengan sepeda motor Yamaha Mio Soul BA 5363 QV, yang dikendarai oleh Akbar Musyafa dan penumpangnya Muhammad Makesya Putra, yang datang dari arah berlawanan.
“Akibat dari kejadian tersebut pengendara sepeda motor Yamaha Mio Soul BA 5363 QV, atas nama Akbar Musyafa mengalami benturan, pendarahan pada kepala, dan meninggal dunia di Instalasi Gawat Darurat (IGD) Rumah Sakit Achmad Mochtar (RSAM) Bukittinggi,” terangnya.
Sedangkan  penumpang atas nama Muhammad Makesya Putra sambung Novandri, mengalami luka lebam dan pendarahan dikepala, patah tulang pada tangan sebelah kanan, kaki sebelah kanan, dan sekarang dalam kondisi koma di Rumah Sakit yang sama.
Korban meninggal dunia Akbar Musyafa salah seorang pelajar di SMP Negeri 3 Bukittinggi, beralamat di Sungai Puar Kecamatan Sungai Puar Kabupaten Agam, dan jenazahnya telah dijemput pihak keluarga untuk dimakamkan.
Sementara Muhammad Makesya Putra, juga seorang pelajar di SMP Negeri 3 Bukittinggi, beralamat di Jalan Garuda No.21 A 4/3, Kelurahan Sapiran Kecamatan Aur Birugo Tigo Baleh Kota Bukittinggi, mengalami luka berat, dan saat ini ditunggui pihak keluarga di Rumah Sakit.
“Kejadian laka lantas di wilayah hukum Polres Bukittinggi itu, sesuai dengan laporan polisi dengan Nomor : LP /181/ XI / 2019 / LL, tanggal 04 November 2019, dan lokasi merupakan jalan beraspal hotmix yang baik, jalan perkotaan yang di sepanjangnya ada pemukiman warga dan objek wisata, jalan tersebut dilengkapi rambu-rambu lalu lintas, serta kondisi permukaan jalan juga baik dan jalan lurus, besar kemungkinan pengendara sepeda motor itu bersama temannya dalam kondisi kencang, hingga kendaraan menjadi tidak stabil, yang pada akhirnya menabrak sisi sebelah kiri mobil Colt Diesel Box yang berlawan arah,” jelasnya.
Akibat peristiwa ini sambung Novandri, korban mengalami kerugian materil RP1 juta, dan petugas dari unit Lakalantas Polres Bukittinggi telah mengambil tindakan, setelah menerima laporan, langsung mendatangi TKP, mencatat keterangan saksi, melakukan olah TKP, pengukuran, penggambaran, dan melaporkan kejadian pada unsur pimpinan.
“Kecelakaan ini murni kelalaian pengendara, untuk itu diharapkan kepada orang tua agar lebih mengawasi anak-anak mereka, terutama yang berada di awah umur, agar tidak dibiarkan berkendara, dan kepada masyarakat juga diingatkan agar memakai helm standar SNI saat mengendarai kendaraan roda dua, sehingga tidak terdampak parah pada saat mengalami kecelakaan,” ungkapnya.
Disamping itu ujar Novendri, pihak Satuan Lalulintas Polres Bukittinggi selalu mengingatkan pengendara untuk berhati-hati di jalan raya, dan setiap pelanggar juga telah diberikan sanksi, serta penyampaian pesan ini juga sudah ditindaklanjuti melalui sosialisasi pada sekolah-sekolah, tinggal lagi bagaimana masyarakat menyikapinya, terutama dengan mematuhi setiap aturan dalam berlalu lintas.

Collision Motorcycle Colt Diesel Box, A Middle School Student in Bukittinggi Died
Nov 04 2019, 21:41 by Yudi Prama Agustino



Collision Motorcycle Colt Diesel Box, A Middle School Student in Bukittinggi Died



Collision Motorcycle Colt Diesel Box, A Middle School Student in Bukittinggi Died


KBRN, Bukittinggi: One motorbike rider known to a student of one of the state junior high school students in Bukittinggi died, after the two-wheeled vehicle he was driving hit a Colt Diesel Box car, on the Panorama Road in front of the Japanese Lobang attraction, Monday, November 4, 2019, approximately 15:30 WIB this afternoon.
The head of the Bukittinggi District Police Lakalantas Unit, Ipda Novandri, said that the Colt Diesel Box car driven by Idris Mintaufik with police number BA 8013 BU, came from the intersection of the Bukittinggi City DPRD toward the intersection of the Upper Ngarai, reaching the crime scene (TKP), colliding with Yamaha Mio Soul BA 5363 QV motorcycle, driven by Akbar Musyafa and its passenger Muhammad Makesya Putra, who came from the opposite direction.
"As a result of the incident the Yamaha Mio Soul BA 5363 QV motorbike driver, on behalf of Akbar Musyafa suffered a collision, bleeding on the head, and died at the Emergency Installation of the Achmad Mochtar Hospital (RSAM) Bukittinggi," he explained.
While passengers on behalf of Muhammad Makesya Putra continued Novandri, suffered bruises and bleeding on the head, broken bones in the right hand, right foot, and now in a coma in the same hospital.
The victim died Akbar Musyafa, one of the students at SMP Negeri 3 Bukittinggi, having his address at Sungai Puar, Sungai Puar Subdistrict, Agam Regency, and his body had been picked up by his family to be buried.
While Muhammad Makesya Putra, also a student at SMP Negeri 3 Bukittinggi, having his address at Jalan Garuda No.21 A 4/3, Sapiran Sub-district, Aur Birugo District, Tigo Baleh, Bukittinggi City, is seriously injured, and is currently accompanied by his family at the Hospital.
"The incident was then in the jurisdiction of Bukittinggi Police Station, according to the police report Number: LP / 181 / XI / 2019 / LL, dated November 4, 2019, and the location is a good hotmix paved road, an urban road along which there are residential settlements and tourist objects, the road is equipped with traffic signs, and road surface conditions are also good and the road is straight, it is probable that the motorcyclist and his friend are in a taut condition, until the vehicle becomes unstable, which eventually crashes into the left side of the Colt car "Diesel Box is the opposite direction," he explained.
As a result of this incident, Novandri continued, the victim suffered a material loss of Rp. 1 million, and officers from the Bukittinggi District Police Lakalantas unit took action, after receiving a report, went directly to the scene of crime, recorded witness statements, conducted crime scenes, measured, depicted, and reported incidents on leadership elements. .
"This accident is purely the negligence of the rider, therefore parents are expected to be more watchful of their children, especially those who are at the age of age, so that they are not allowed to drive, and to the public are also reminded to wear SNI standard helmets when driving two-wheeled vehicles, so not badly affected when an accident occurs, "he said.
Besides that, Novendri said, the Bukittinggi Police Traffic Traffic Unit always reminded motorists to be careful on the highway, and every violator had also been given sanctions, and the delivery of this message had also been followed up through socialization to schools, left to live how the community reacted to it, especially by obeying every rule in traffic.
